trans-unit.source: It supports a wide variety of authentication devices like OTP tokens (HMAC, HOTP, TOTP, OCRA, mOTP), Yubikey (HOTP, TOTP, AES), FIDO U2F, as well as FIDO2 WebAuthn devices like Yubikey and Plug-Up, smartphone Apps like Google Authenticator, FreeOTP, Token2 or TiQR, SMS, Email, SSH keys, x509 certificates and Registration Codes for easy deployment.
trans-unit.target: 它支持多种认证设备,如OTP令牌(HMAC、HOTP、TOTP、OCRA、mOTP)、Yubikey(HOTP、TOTP、AES)、FIDO U2F,以及FIDO2 WebAuthn设备(如Yubikey和Plug-Up)、智能手机App(如Google Authenticator、FreeOTP、Token2或TiQR)、SMS、Email、SSH密钥、x509证书和注册码,便于部署。

trans-unit.source: Now you can connect to http://localhost:5000 with your browser and login as administrator.

privacyIDEA
privacyIDEA adheres to Semantic Versioning.

privacyIDEA does not bind you to any decision of the authentication protocol or it does not dictate you where your user information should be stored. This is achieved by its totally modular architecture. privacyIDEA is not only open as far as its modular architecture is concerned. But privacyIDEA is completely licensed under the AGPLv3.
trans-unit.target: privacyIDEA 不会让你受制于任何认证协议的决定,也不会规定你的用户信息应该存储在哪里。这是通过其完全模块化的架构来实现的.privacyIDEA不仅是开放的,就其模块化的架构而言。但是privacyIDEA是完全在AGPLv3下授权的。

trans-unit.source: privacyIDEA is an open solution for strong two-factor authentication like OTP tokens, SMS, smartphones or SSH keys. Using privacyIDEA you can enhance your existing applications like local login (PAM, Windows Credential Provider), VPN, remote access, SSH connections, access to web sites or web portals with a second factor during authentication. Thus boosting the security of your existing applications.
trans-unit.target: privacyIDEA是一个开放的解决方案,用于强大的双因素认证,如OTP令牌、短信、智能手机或SSH密钥。使用privacyIDEA,您可以增强您现有的应用程序,如本地登录(PAM,Windows凭证提供者),VPN,远程访问,SSH连接,访问网站或网络门户的第二个因素在认证过程中。从而提高您现有应用程序的安全性。

trans-unit.source: privacyIDEA is based on Flask and SQLAlchemy as the python backend. The web UI is based on angularJS and bootstrap. A MachineToken design lets you assign tokens to machines. Thus you can use your Yubikey to unlock LUKS, assign SSH keys to SSH servers or use Offline OTP with PAM.
trans-unit.target: privacyIDEA基于Flask和SQLAlchemy作为python后台。Web UI基于angularJS和bootstrap。MachineToken的设计让你可以给机器分配代币。因此,您可以使用您的Yubikey来解锁LUKS,为SSH服务器分配SSH密钥,或者使用PAM的离线OTP。

trans-unit.source: privacyIDEA runs as an additional service in your network and you can connect different applications to privacyIDEA.
trans-unit.target: privacyIDEA作为一个额外的服务在您的网络中运行,您可以将不同的应用程序连接到 privacyIDEA。

trans-unit.source: privacyIDEA: identity, multifactor authentication (OTP), authorization, audit
trans-unit.target: privacyIDEA:身份认证、多因素认证(OTP)、授权、审计。

which is responsible for basic configuration in the database table

trans-unit.source: which provides functions for users. There is no database table user, since users are dynamically read from the user sources like SQL, LDAP, SCIM or flat files.
trans-unit.target: 它为用户提供功能。没有数据库表用户,因为用户是从SQL、LDAP、SCIM或平面文件等用户源动态读取的。
